column3: Latest; A British English teacher was found dead in a rented house. He was discovered after neighbours complained of a bad smell coming from the property.------ The body of Timothy James Searle
column4: a 33 year old British national was found at 8:30 am on May 22
column5: 2019 on the first floor living room at # 69A
column7: Chamkar Mon.------The badly decomposed body had been dead for around 3 days according to police
column8: who recorded his death as a heart attack.------ An unknown woman arrived at the scene and told police she had lived with the British man as  husband and wife They had a 4-year-old girl together
column9: but had broken up over two years ago.------ The same woman said that the victim had a physical condition and went back to England for treatment two or three times.------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/849090.html
